name: BanchoMamemon
description: BanchoMamemon is a small, ball-like Digimon who have been styled after the modern Banchō , a particular type of juvenile delinquent. It has red eyes, a fang, and a scar on the left side of its face. It wears a black cap with a golden Mamemon badge, a GAKU-RAN , and black shoes. Its Ōgon Bat looks like a mix between a tonfa and a brass knuckle , with the tonfa part being golden, and the brass knuckle part being red. The tip of the Ōgon Bat has a golden Mamemon face sculpted on it.
